data.text:
Solution

Verified by Toppr

Prime Minister of the Bahamani kingdom who built a madrasa at Bidar was Mohammad Gawan. Mahmud Gawan was a Prime Minister in the Bahamani Sultanate of Deccan. Mahmud Gawan was well-versed in Islamic theology, Persian language and Mathematics and was a poet. madrasa at Bidar is an ancient Islamic college in Bidar, Karnataka, India. It was built in the 1460s and is an example of the regional style of Indo-Islamic architecture under the Bahmani Sultanate.
